attributes.action: Let all the UK vote on IndyRef for Scotland asap.
attributes.additional_details: If SNP claim they should have an IndyRef when they want, it should also be right for the rest of the UK to have a vote on an IndyRef to either keep them in the UK or expel them and when it should take place.
attributes.background: It should not be for Scotland alone to determine when an IndyRef should take place as Scotland is heavily subsidised by the rest of the UK and all the UK electors should have a vote on whether Scotland becomes independent or not and when the vote takes place.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the decision to leave the Union would be a matter for the people of Scotland based on their consent, rather than by a decision of the UK Government.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Hold a referendum on English independence: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/580126
